intro.title: About Loving Kindness
intro.content: Loving Kindness is a mindfulness practice that helps you cultivate warmth and compassion toward yourself and others. It involves intentionally sending positive thoughts and well wishes, using phrases like "May I (or you) be safe and happy".

exercises.title: Loving Kindness Practice
exercises.description: A guided meditation practice to cultivate warmth and compassion toward yourself, loved ones, neutral people, and even difficult people through intentional positive wishes.

conclusion.title: Practice with Kindness
conclusion.content: Loving Kindness isn't about forcing positive feelingsâ€”it's about practicing a mindset shift. Over time, this practice can help you feel lighter, more connected, and more at peace with yourself and others.
